snippet.title: Tekken 2 (1996) Intro (PlayStation)
snippet.description: Following up from the success of its predecessor, Tekken 2 massively improved on the graphics and gameplay. While Tekken still hadn't yet found its true identity, steps were being made towards doing so. This was also the first game to feature fan favourite Jun Kazama, and she wouldn't appear in another canonical Tekken game until Tekken 8.
